title: Three-loop evolution kernel for transversity operator
authors: A. N. Manashov, S. Moch and L. A. Shumilov
abstract:
We calculate quantum corrections to the symmetry generators for the
transversity operators in quantum chromodynamics (QCD) in the two-loop
approximation. Using this result, we obtain the evolution kernel for the
corresponding operators at three loops. The explicit expression for the
anomalous dimension matrix in the Gegenbauer basis is given for the first few
operators.
